node.title: Child confirmed as NSW's seventh Omicron COVID-19 case, more exposure sites named
node.description: A Sydney Woolworths is among a number of venues visited by a child who is NSW's seventh confirmed case of the Omicron COVID-19 variant.
node.content:
["A child too young to be vaccinated has been confirmed by NSW Health as the state's seventh\u00a0Omicron COVID-19 case.", "NSW Health said the child, along with his family, had not spent time in southern Africa and arrived on flight QR908 from Doha to Sydney on Thursday, November 23.", "The new infection was identified after\u00a0urgently retested swabs were taken from 500 returned travellers who have arrived in the state since November 22.", "The parents, who are both fully vaccinated, have tested positive to COVID-19 and are currently\u00a0undergoing genomic testing to confirm if they are also positive to the new variant.", "NSW Health has released a\u00a0list of exposure venues on Sydney's lower north shore for the period from Tuesday, November 23 to Wednesday, December 1.", "Anyone who was at these venue on those dates is considered a casual contact and must immediately get tested and isolate until receiving a negative result.", "The family is currently isolating in a Sydney quarantine facility.", "NSW Health is requesting every person\u00a0who was on the flight\u00a0to immediately get a PCR test and self-isolate while awaiting further advice.", "Positive Omicron cases have also been identified in passengers on\u00a0two other Qatar Airways flights from Doha, which landed on November 25 and 27 respectively.", "Two further cases arrived on Singapore Airlines flight SQ211 on Sunday.", "Health authorities have urged all people potentially impacted by the flights or exposure sites to get another test even if they had been tested in recent days.", "Health Minister Brad Hazzard said swab samples\u00a0taken from\u00a0500\u00a0travellers who flew into the state since November 22\u00a0had\u00a0tested\u00a0negative for the Omicron strain.", "All of the 271 COVID-19 cases announced in the 24 hours to 8pm last night\u00a0were Delta strain infections.", "Mr Hazzard said authorities remained on high alert but were\u00a0pleased with the low number of Omicron cases detected so far.\u00a0", "All travellers arriving in Australia from South Africa, Lesotho, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia, Eswatini and Malawi must isolate for 14 days under new rules introduced to curb the spread of Omicron.", "People who\u00a0have been in those countries within the last 14 days must enter self-isolation and get tested immediately.", "Fines for not complying with health orders have been raised to $10,000 for companies and $5,000 for individuals in response to Omicron fears.", "Fully vaccinated travellers who have not been in those countries can leave isolation after 72 hours if they receive a negative test.", "A man from Cabramatta in Sydney's south west, who had been in Nigeria for six months, was yesterday confirmed to have the Omicron variant.", "Mr Hazzard said the man's\u00a0interaction in the community had been minimal.", "\"Clearly the community in Cabramatta are on high alert, but I stress the gentleman in his 40s had not been out and about at many facilities. So at this stage there has been no evidence of further transmission in the area.\" Mr Hazzard said.", "\"It is reassuring it has not appeared to spread in the community, but as Health Minister I seriously question whether we already have it out in the community.", "\"We know it is highly transmissible, but the good news to date, generally it is showing up in a very mild way with the individuals who have it.\"", "There are now eight confirmed cases of the Omicron strain in Australia, with the other case discovered in a person in quarantine in the Northern Territory.", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
